data.Name: Dave Thomas Junior
data.Bio: Dave Thomas Junior is a singer songwriter from England with an eclectic range of styles and skills, from writing and producing for his alter ego 'The Lost' signed to Island Records in the UK, to writing with Echo & The Bunnymen for their upcoming release 'The Fountain'. He is also working with the indie buzz band out of Chicago, 'Moneypenny'. His acoustic songs are written from the heart, and recorded in the early hours of the morning when everyone else is asleep. Read more on Last.fm
